name: Coalescence (Seldon)
description:
Small experimental game made almost entirely in raymarching for the Metroidvania Month 16 game jam. It's very short and I had no time to add a boss but I might do that later.

Controls : 

- WASD / Spacebar : movement / jump

- Escape : pause menu

- Mouse left click : normal fire

- Mouse right click [Hold] : beam (to be unlocked)

- Left-Shift [Hold] : shield (to be unlocked)

Free tip : Stay away from fire, it burns.
